stitches = 10cm in stockinette stitch instructions 1 using 3 5mm needles cast on 108 stitches in dark yarn join in the round being careful not to twist the stitches 2 knit ribbing 2k 2p repeat in dark yarn until ribbing measures 5cm 10cm for folded brim 3 using 4mm needles knit a round of stockinette stitch placing marker at 0 27 54 and 81 ex jackard stitches 0 & 54 are the start of the chart 27 &
